actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire thrall makes two Rapier attacks.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Blood-Bound
special_abilities.desc: If the thrall has not consumed 1 ounce of blood from a vampire within the past week, it is poisoned for 1 week, and it loses darkvision and its Limited Regeneration, Spider Climb, and Sunlight Sensitivity traits until it consumes 1 ounce of vampire blood.

special_abilities.name: Limited Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The thrall regains 2 HP at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP and isn't in sunlight. If the thrall takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thrall's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The thrall can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the thrall has disadvantage on attack rolls, and its Perception is 8 when perceiving by sight.
